entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:56 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -18.6°C

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
